pkgmetadata.longdescription: Doubly-Robust Nonparametric Estimation and Inference // Targeted minimum loss-based estimators of counterfactual means and causal effects that are doubly-robust with respect both to consistency and asymptotic normality (Benkeser et al (2017), doi:10.1093/biomet/asx053; MJ van der Laan (2014), doi:10.1515/ijb-2012-0038).
